title: A New vision
creator_credit: John Halas and Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films
brief_description: A short series of films about great artists which aims to entertain and excite audience attention as well as to inform, by blending computer animation and graphics, traditional animation and, where appropriate, live action with shots of the works under discussion.
